resources.string: In these unprecedented times we need all the help we can get. We’re all in this together! In an effort to help we’ve made an app to help you always have food to eat. In order to use the app to the fullest we’ve also included a guide to get around the app!

At the start the app shows you both free food resources and discounted food resources. \nIf you click on the gear icon then you will have the option to login, logout, sign in, or click the help button, as you\'ve done. \nClicking on one of the food resource items will take you to a screen with more details pertaining to the item.
For users who need just a little more help
